name: list_tasks
description: List all tasks from both global and space-specific locations. Can filter by agent, status, and priority. Returns tasks sorted by priority, then agent, then title.

agent.description: Optional: Filter tasks by agent ID (e.g., 'budget_tracker')

target_space.description: Optional: Target a specific named space (e.g., 'creative', 'education'). Defaults to current space.
